name: ZEO: Stranger
description:
Zeo: Stranger is Fps, Puzzel mixed with a little horror style. If you think you are good at riddles then it is your game.

You will play as an old toy, who tries to leave the room but it's not that easy there is some toys who did the same thing before him but they didn't end up well.

When you finish the game there is a timer, if you think you can beat the game as a speedrun, share the timer with us #Zeo_Stranger.

And special thanks to those beautiful people who helped me with this project. I LOVE YOU ALL ❤️
